name: Trenchline
description:
"Mercenaries make easy money," your army buddies said. "It's
all scowls and shows of force. It'll never come to real fighting."
Well, they're all dead now, and here you are. Stranded deep in a
war zone, running from the fascist government, in a country you hadn't
even heard of two months ago.

This is a very small training game, used to learn TADS3.  Mission Accomplished!
